props.block: Expands the button to 100% of available space.
props.color: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). You can find list of built in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).
props.disabled: Removes the ability to click or target the component.
props.icon: Designates the button as icon. Button will become _round_ and applies the **text** prop.
props.plain: Removes the default background change applied when hovering over the button.
props.text: Makes the background transparent. When using the **color** prop, the color will be applied to the button text instead of the background.
